ActivityMetadata.Name: GH Create a GitHub App from a manifest
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH Create a GitHub App from a manifest
ActivityMetadata.Description: Use this endpoint to complete the handshake necessary when implementing the [GitHub App Manifest flow](https://developer.github.com/apps/building-github-apps/creating-github-apps-from-a-manifest/). When you create a GitHub App with the manifest flow, you receive a temporary `code` used to retrieve the GitHub App's `id`, `pem` (private key), and `webhook_secret`.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

Create a GitHub App from a manifest

Use this endpoint to complete the handshake necessary when implementing the [GitHub App Manifest flow](https://developer.github.com/apps/building-github-apps/creating-github-apps-from-a-manifest/). When you create a GitHub App with the manifest flow, you receive a temporary `code` used to retrieve the GitHub App's `id`, `pem` (private key), and `webhook_secret`.

Method: Post

OperationID: apps/create-from-manifest

EndPoint:

/app-
